## Description {#details}

Diagnostic information for optimization analysis remarks.

Definition at line 853 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### OptimizationRemarkAnalysis() {#ab4fa4fd4a389f0d81f5f413d21b2c4c4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>OptimizationRemarkAnalysis::OptimizationRemarkAnalysis (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RemarkName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; CodeRegion)</>}>
<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic.

If this name matches the regular expression given in -Rpass-analysis=, then the diagnostic will be emitted. <code>RemarkName</code> is a textual identifier for the remark (single-word, camel-case). <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the debug location and <code>CodeRegion</code> is the region that the optimization operates on (currently only block is supported).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00861">861</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp/#l00344">344</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp">DiagnosticInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### OptimizationRemarkAnalysis() {#a48bdcbaf3e1f8e4e09c3507ce7d0afd6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::OptimizationRemarkAnalysis::OptimizationRemarkAnalysis (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Prepend, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkanalysis">OptimizationRemarkAnalysis</a> &amp; Orig)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This is ctor variant allows a pass to build an optimization remark from an existing remark.

This is useful when a transformation pass (e.g LV) wants to emit a remark (<code>Orig</code>) generated by one of its analyses (e.g. LAA) as its own analysis remark. The string <code>Prepend</code> will be emitted before the original message.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00872">872</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### OptimizationRemarkAnalysis() {#a7d0a9378ede1f0821eb273c8e797df06}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>OptimizationRemarkAnalysis::OptimizationRemarkAnalysis (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RemarkName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Inst)</>}>
Same as above but <code>Inst</code> is used to derive code region and debug location.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00878">878</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp/#l00351">351</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp">DiagnosticInfo.cpp</a>.

### OptimizationRemarkAnalysis() {#ad3c742fcad66bf2ca0afe6d1b58b6c8b}

<MemberDefinition

## Private Constructors

### OptimizationRemarkAnalysis() {#a2660f622d95de1b020358761ad6ede4f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::OptimizationRemarkAnalysis::OptimizationRemarkAnalysis (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; Fn, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Msg)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This is deprecated now and only used by the function API below.

<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic. If this name matches the regular expression given in -Rpass-analysis=, then the diagnostic will be emitted. <code>Fn</code> is the function where the diagnostic is being emitted. <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the location information to use in the diagnostic. If line table information is available, the diagnostic will include the source code location. <code>Msg</code> is the message to show. Note that this class does not copy this message, so this reference must be valid for the whole life time of the diagnostic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00918">918</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
